name: Hampton Inn & Suites Austin Cedar Park - Lakeline

reviews.text: Overall, this is a fantastic Hampton Inn. Very clean, quiet, and super friendly staff. We have stayed at alot of Hampton Inns over the years, and this one had everything we love about Hampton except for a microwave and fridge in our room. Those amenities are part of the reason we choose Hampton Inns, and we have come to expect it - especially at a newer property. This property only offers it in their suites (which aren't available at my per diem rate). Since we were staying for 2 weeks, we asked for one to be put in our room, but was told that it was not possible. What a shame, because if they would have only been willing to do it, this would be my choice for all future stays. Instead, I will have to look elsewhere next time. I stay weeks at a time, and a fridge/microwave is needed. Also, very finicky A/C unit - either too cold or up one degree and the heater kicks on. Very noisy with it kicking on/off constantly.
reviews.title: Very good, but missing a few things I expect from Hampton

reviews.text: We stayed here last weekend for a family wedding, and it was a very convenient location to highways and restaurants. Because of the hot weather we appreciated the sparkling pool with umbrella tables and hotel supplied towels. The breakfast was just what we needed, many healthy choices as well more hearty ones. We were perfectly comfortable in our room, and it was quiet both nights we were there. We found the manager very responsive to a small concern, and appreciated the service.
reviews.title: Enjoyed the pool!

reviews.text: The hotel was clean, comfortable and affordable. The King suite is extra nice, having a refridgerator, microwave, sink, etc. Very large and pleasant decor. The double queen was standard size, comfortable, a/c worked great. Very attractive bath.
reviews.title: Good Value

reviews.text: Clean, friendly. Good access to restaurants. The staff was very friendly and helpful both with the facility but also the area around. We had several meetings there including breakfast meetings and this served us also very well.
reviews.title: Good place to stay!

reviews.text: I stayed here a week for business and the hotel was very clean and super comfortable.
reviews.title: Great staff and super clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We only stay one night at the hotel, but it was great. The room was nice and the bathroom was very clean. The AC does not smell. Our friends dropped by and they thought the room was excellent as well. Breakfast was good. I like the fact that they allowed us to make our own waffle. I was disappointed that we didn't have any whip cream, but at least we have fresh fruits, tea, coffee, eggs, and other good breakfast items. Would have stayed longer if we were not in a rush.
reviews.title: Great, Clean, Luxurious Hotel

reviews.text: We were very pleased with our stay. The reception staff were very friendly - maybe it's a Texan thing! The rooms were nicely appointed. The fitness center was small but adequate. We would stay here again.
reviews.title: Friendly staff, clean, comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Clean hotel with comfortable rooms. There was a lot of activity at the hotel but that did not impact the service nor the sleep quality. Good decor. Spring for the extra few bucks for the suite. The only negative is the sink area is open to the bedroom which meant when I was up early to get ready, my spouse could not sleep.
reviews.title: Clean and Comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in a King suite and I was very impressed with the spaciousness, the décor and the cleanliness of the room. I would definitely stay here again and will look for Hampton Inn and Suites for my next vacation........!
reviews.title: Beautiful rooms

reviews.text: We stayed there for a football tournament and it was a nice, clean, safe place to stay. The washer and dryer came in handy for those dirty uniforms. We didn't have time to use the pool but it looked nice and the service at the front desk was awesome. They were very helpful with recommendations about eating places in that area.
reviews.title: Great place to stay
Really ? you want a title ?
reviews.text: average hotel.. close to mall.. easy to get to.. Don't be late at breakfast. LOTS of hungry people when you say FREE.. Really, you want me to try and think of good things about this stay when all I can think of is negative..
We visited cedar park for graduation weekend, the rates were extremely elevated at the other chains, except for the Hampton Inn. The rates are pretty consistent.
reviews.title: So Happy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On our last night there, the elevator was not functioning and the GM took very good care of us. I could, I would stay at Hampton for the rest of my life. Breakfast was good, the rooms were super clean. The area was nice and our drive to leander was not too bad.
reviews.title: Trip Advisor

reviews.text: We will be there again June 2014.
reviews.title: Way better than the average Hampton Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was nice, very spacious. Loved the openness. Modern in appearance although bed wasn't as comfortable as I hoped. Room was clean although I did find a small roach in the room. Location was perfect, trees in back and close to amenities. Breakfast a bit lite on pastry selection. No cookies or snacks in lobby area.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: The employees were very nice! The breakfast was different everyday (stayed for 3 nights) and good. Rooms were lovely and super clean! Parking was free and close. Pool was wonderful also! Location was wonderful...plenty of places to go eat and shop.
reviews.title: Awesome!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent place for us to visit Great-Grandson. Location, service, breakfast, internet all excellent. Will certainly stay in this hotel the next time we visit Austin area. Very good value for the cost.
reviews.title: Wonderful Stay

reviews.text: This Hampton Inn is very well managed and at the top of all Hampton Inns that I have stayed at. The staff is very friendly and helpful without being intrusive. The fitness room has been recently refurbished and is well maintained.
reviews.title: Great Experience

reviews.text: Our room was very comfortable. We especially liked the fresh, clean bed linens - the duvets are freshly washed for each guest. The bed was very comfortable too. It is off the main road and very quiet. Would have been nice to have low-fat cream cheese for the bagel.
reviews.title: Really nice place to stay

reviews.text: Very nice and clean hotel. Check in process was a breeze. I reached in town before check-in time of 3 PM. Called hotel and they were OK with in checking in at 2 PM (one hour early). The staff is very friendly and professional. Has great breakfast service with very good choice. Rooms and clean and fresh. Well connected to the freeways. It was a excellent stay for my family.
reviews.title: Excelent hotel

aka: Hampton Inn & Suites Austin Cedar Park - Lakeline Hotel
description: We are just minutes from Lake Travis in Texas Hill Country and offer many Texas attractions for your vacation enjoyment. Explore Cedar Park cave preserves or travel on the Austin Steam Train. Our Hampton hotel offers free breakfast and complimentary WiFi to help you feel right at home during your Austin visit!
